posts.title: 2026, Let's Pray Together
posts.excerpt: Launching a year-long prayer focus with weekly gatherings and daily prompts.
posts.body_markdown:
# A Year of Prayer

We are setting aside 2026 to pray together as a church family. Join us every Wednesday night for guided prayer, and take a daily prayer prompt home.

## Weekly Rhythm
- Wednesday Prayer at 7:30 PM
- Saturday Prayer at 6:30 AM

## How to Participate
Bring a friend, invite your family, and let us know how we can pray for you.

posts.title: Community Care Weekend
posts.excerpt: Volunteers will pack meals, deliver care kits, and host a neighborhood cookout.
posts.body_markdown:
# Community Care Weekend

We are partnering with local organizations to serve our neighbors. The weekend includes meal packing, care kit deliveries, and a community cookout.

## Volunteer Opportunities
- Meal packing team
- Delivery drivers
- Hospitality and setup

Sign up at the Welcome Desk on Sunday.
